artist: Painter: Carl de Moor; Engraver: Pieter van Gunst
description: man with black coat and flat white collar, curly white wig; right hand across chest in a circular frame with scrolls on frame edge above a pedestal with long Latin inscription
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: [Ca. d. Moore pinx.   P.v Gunst Sculpt Amst./FREDERICUS SPANHEMIUS FR. F./( 6 lines in latin)/ Cuni & impensis T. Verbessel]; on sheet in pencil; 1-512]
title: Portrait of Fredericus Spanheimius Fr.F.
